article:
'List of Scottish writers' is an incomplete alphabetical list of Scottish
writers who have a Wikipedia page. Those on the list were born and/or brought up
in Scotland. They include writers of all genres, writing in English, Lowland
Scots, Scottish Gaelic, Latin, French or any other language. Please help by
adding new names, using the present entry format as far as possible. Writers put
on the list who are still without a Wikipedia page have been transferred to the
"No-pagers" section on the Talk page.

Abbreviations used: awa = also writes/wrote as, b. = born, c. = circa, fl. =
floruit (flourished), or. = originally, RC = Roman Catholic, SF = science
fiction, YA = young-adult.

This is a subsidiary list to the List of Scots.
